basics.name: John Paul Alonzo

basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2024.

work.company: Vice Provost Office of Academic Excellence
highlights: Coordinate with different faculty members for the graduation ceremony
Catogrizeing and analyze the data for my office

volunteer.summary: Problem solving for different levels of programming to improve existing skills in different programming languages.
highlights: Working with others in the same major as me improving my ability to work with others.
Understanding how to improve the our resume and better understanding how to network.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
